short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is used by NimRecorder to automate browser actions. It is not intended to be used as a standalone extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NimRecorder allows users to capture, replicate and execute synthetic user actions. 

This extension is to be used in conjugation with DX Unified Infrastructure Management's 'End-to-End Application Monitoring (e2e_AppMon) probe' to help monitor performance and availability metrics associated with these synthetic transactions.

THIS IS A WHITE LABEL EXTENSION FOR WINTASK
